Clients: **Takano Corp,** general manufacturing, software, rocketry.
NPCs: **Garbus**, bioaugmented researcher. Fuzzy. Slit eyes. Looking to strike it BIG.
Locations: **Greenlight**, colony: far below the canopy, a bubble city; tech experiments

Clients: **Barony of Saxfith the Vast**, corrupt hungry aristocracy.
NPCs: **Lucien**, genetically-engineered trust fund baby. Frail, demanding, crazy rich.
Locations: **Bollstone**, colony: ancient insectile bastion, erroneously believed to be human in origin

Clients: **Henjen Systems**, shipbuilders under Takano, as all things.
NPCs: **Stan Rykiel**, astronaut: half-dead, puppeteer'd by an insect in his ribcage.
Locations: **Brahe**, planet: rolling rain damp hills, one of the first t-forms, heirloom flora

NPCs: **Thierry**, fashionable mercenary. Lounging manner, exotic weaponry, aesthete.
Locations: **Onasilos**, planet: irradiated desert; vast caverns beneath; biotech wild west

Clients: **Hive Union Local 1906**, represents colonial workers.
NPCs: **Troy**, former marine trying to settle down with family. Burn scars. Smokes.
Locations: **WALD-39a**, planet: dark xenoforest, toxic, scattered outposts, howling wind

Clients: **Rotavax Medical**, medical supply manufacturing and research.
NPCs: **Bolton**, Takano rep., jolly, willing to cut deals at the cost of personal favors later.
Locations: **KB-19**, planet: gas giant with orbital junkyard. Once a comms hub.

Clients: **Blanton & Jan**, legal firm; fictive founders, legions of agents.
NPCs: **Montana,** rocket jockey, dyed hair, retinue of androids. DTF. Party animal. Jock.
Locations: **Luyten b**, planet: super earth, orbiting brown dwarf, balmy barren surface.

Clients: **XAVECTOL Systems**, large scale technology, avionics, mil. tech.
NPCs: **Alana Gallagher**, salvager. Elaborate braids, family nearby, mixed up with bad people.
Locations: **Sudden Watch**, outpost: dugout, multiple gun positions, anti-air radar

Clients: **AGRIMAX Consolidated**, agricultural research and supply.
NPCs: **Lagerfeld**, archeologist: hiring crew for a dig, has rumors of xenoarchitecture.
Locations: **Mohlen Reach**, outpost: isolated retreat, clustered huts, decades of rent for cheap

Clients: **Albat Shipping Corp.**, cut-rate long-haul shipping.
NPCs: **Chavefsky**, crimelord: enjoys the baser things. Bathrobe. Still gets his hands dirty.
Locations: **Kavarskas**, colony: bitter cold, high walls, lamps on every corner; an archive

Clients: **Nulle Technologies**, high-grade personal technologies.
NPCs: **Yohji**, harpooner: methodical and kind. Several generations in the job.
Locations: **GDC Alpha**, training facility: on wind blasted steppes, new pilots take flight

Clients: **Macbeth-Linkovich Consolidated Logistics**, heavy transit, large scale.
NPCs: **Liz**, chipper android, pink outer shell. Escaped abusive work environment.
Locations: **Drillsite Sentinel**, mining colony: deep bore, 1st edge of a new expansion

Clients: **VERNER, ltd.**, processing, extraction, bulk goods, heavy machinery.
NPCs: **Barth & Skeat**, underlings: smuggle rare goods and people. Utterly unscrupulous.
Locations: **Prosenik**, penal colony: lonely, communal. Ramshackle housing; deadly fauna

Clients: **Cataplex**, media titan, owns most likenesses, "balanced reporting".
NPCs: **Strauss**, professor: stuffy, bearded, has a cat. Prosthetic legs. Anti-corporate.
Locations: **Lorsha Dependency**, planetary claim: a slice of a much-desired world; frigid.

Clients: **The COMDOT Network**, subnet infrastructure and data collection.
NPCs: **Klein & Bonger**, lowlives: matching ski-masks and switchblades. Mostly lazy.
Locations: **Mount Terror**, dig site: volcano rising above even the atmosphere. Odd stone eggs.

Clients: **Dragoon Processing Corp.** (Defunct), VERNER competitor; lost.
NPCs: **Bernhardt**, bodyguard: bulky, shotgun-wielding, visor-for-eyes. Several backup sleeves.
Locations: **Seal Fry**, depot: drips with grease, lube. Refuge for tired spacers. Far out.

Clients: **LOANFRIEND**, companionship gigwork, various ranked tiers.
NPCs: **Ignacio Ruiz**, VERNER C-level. Claims humble origins. Xeno-obsessed.
Locations: **Erebus**, derelict: a spindle, hanging broken. Its contents spilled like glitter.

Clients: **Boppi**, communications giant, planetary internets, browsing, etc.
NPCs: **Graves**, bounty hunter: assumed name. Face tattoos. Works cheap, messy jobs.
Locations: **One Ton Eye**, monitoring station: vast biotech blob for sensing gods.

Clients: **Chatflap**, invasive instant messaging, needs ambassadors, content.
NPCs: **Pelton**, security chief: big mustache, scrawny, working up the ladder. On the take.
Locations: **Site-411**, restricted testing site: layers of fence; attempts to get deeper than jumpspace

Clients: **Groundflor**, personnel management bureau, parasitic.
NPCs: **Anders**, PYRAMID Extraction rep. Bald, humorless, stained by mining dyes. Company clone.
Locations: **DH-6302c**, planet: terrestrial giant, no atmosphere, high eccentricity, mineral rich

Clients: **Subgov**, generic term for sub-local government, planet-sized or smaller.
NPCs: **Holly Assante**, out-of-work merc: consummate veteran. Rough. Drinking problem.
Locations: **The Bear**, derelict: fattened expedition vessel, slowly starved ... then eaten

NPCs: **Cobalt**, corporate operator: all-blue eyes. Believes themself a stylish killer. Pitiless.
Locations: **The Odontspire**, religious site: blackened fingernail, mass data-vaults, blue doors

NPCs: **Igor**, cook: makes a mean stew, runs a small place, in debt to bad folks.
Locations: **Growler Canyon**, backworld landform: winding, traitorous, perverse limestone

NPCs: **Dr. Faltz**, celebrity physician: changes faces, sculpts bodies, harvests from the living.
Locations: **MT-9317a**, planet: terrestrial dwarf. Green crags, hyperactive volcanism; ghosts?

NPCs: **Brickbat**, hitman: face surgically flattened. Cybermodded. Likes crunch time.
Locations: **Challenge**, metropolis: stonework; a city of blades beneath corporate headquarters.

NPCs: **Eggmont Lamondson**, C-level in the Demersal Baron's court. Opulent, greedy.
Locations: **The Shallows**, region: inland sea, a string of resorts, now abandoned. Piracy.

NPCs: **Jankowski**, navigator: a little cracked. Worships jumpspace. Knitted beanie.
Locations: **Shackleton Hatch**, huge alien doorway, 3-lobed, like the moon's heart. Archeological dig.

NPCs: **Holiday**, vagabond: keeping a log. Knows a lot of rumors. Will skip out on you.
Locations: **Dropsite Zulu**, farthest expedition site, scattered drone supplies, valley floor.

NPCs: **T. Jon Valence**, partner at Blanton & Jan: smiley, friendly, bills by the minute.
Locations: **VB-9731**, planet: terrestrial super earth. Slow rotation. Near-pitch fog. High O2, tall plants.

NPCs: **Masha**, hacker: stylish. Drug problems. Always chasing a high.
Locations: **Gallows Hill**, settlement: wire-wracked knob. Swinging bodies. Small colony. Yellow sky.

NPCs: **Chipp Drake**, Cataplex rep: latest trends, garish shirts, buzzwords, horny AF.
Locations: **Ygariumi Waste**, planum: terraforming runoff, strange mutations.

NPCs: **Vondrev**, survivalist: wrapped in poncho. Buys and sells gear. Gruff.
Locations: **COLDREEF**, blacksite: dissidents and hostages on ice. Tower of pods. Control center.

NPCs: **Paul Roth-Caverly**, technician: just cleared apprentice. Space-born.
Locations: **Whiteline Reach**, outpost: chalky ground, fabric structures, high winds, masked locals.

NPCs: **Lara Reitz**, teamster: union organizer, carries sabotage kit.
Locations: **Morning Glory**, city: vaulted archways, engineered vines, gondola system, plasticized.

NPCs: **Walden**, salvager: big beard, synthetic muskrat pet, grows plants.
Locations: **Palidar**, colony: thick walls and pillboxes, remnant of an old war, still fought, deep tunnels.

NPCs: **Lowry**, mechanic: gear-head, drips with tools. Nothing they can't fix.
Locations: **Blinny**, settlement: single painted dome, cheerful, atop many-story fishworks.

NPCs: **Thoreau**, scholar: ancient languages, dead concepts, and university funding.
Locations: **New Adalaide**, colony: low-lying suburb, cooling tunnels, wind farm, company town.

NPCs: **Crosspox**, slicked: exposed neuro-nodes, spiky hair, atrophied. Won 3rd in the arm.
Locations: **The Ororborous**, station: high-tech torus, many decks of servers and desks, derelict canyons.

NPCs: **Quintero**, gig-jockey: brash, hustle-positive. Holographic robe. Big on sushi.
Locations: **FOB Grifflet**, mil. base: responding to calls to pacify militants on an ag-world.

NPCs: **Meggeson**, hauler: short-hop. Lonely work. Hard. Looking for a new job.
Locations: **RJO-37**, ship: long-haul warship. Preserved cyberaugmented crew, bulbous and nuke-armed.

NPCs: **Klarissa**, geologist: academy-fresh. Ponytail. Bright-eyed landlubber.
Locations: **Owens Rest**, waystation: fuel stores, trailing spokes, capsule rooms, limited amenities.

NPCs: **Addison**, courier: goth-punk. Happy to encrypt traffic, work under the table.
Locations: **FEEDHOUSE**, station: hanging labgrowth, 0g factory, skeins of skin, winding bowel.

NPCs: **Ria**, scout: carries a really big rifle. Trust issues. Sadistic streak.
Locations: **Ransome's Rig**, ship: mercantile for weary travelers, antique gear, rumors, salt baths.

NPCs: **Comitissa Arcada**, minor noble: compassionate facade, ruthless bodyguards.
Locations: **Saltback**, leviathan: geological scale, extensive parasitism. 6 fins. Monastery.

NPCs: **Dr. Llewellyn**, terraforming specialist: thinks he's the bees knees, near a huge breakthrough.
Locations: **Pork-Rind-93**, station: unlicensed multiplex dealing in sleeves, growth vats, bioaugmentation.

NPCs: **Jamie Skewes**, organ mule: weirdly happy about this job. Hires company nightly.
Locations: **Sacral Rift**, landform: wide-bottomed rift valley, mineral rich, undiscovered lifeforms.

NPCs: **Eve Reinhardt**, union rep: jokes around, tactical, pushes wedges, throws ragers.
Locations: **Bonchevska**, colony: Built in huge colony ship ruin, clinging on, ruthless admin, frozen.

NPCs: **Gianlorenzo**, android waitstaff: boundless snobbery comes factory-default.
Locations: **TD-068**, planetoid: fleshy beneath crust. Rare minerals in its flesh. Spiraling organs.

NPCs: **Euphemia Fairchild**, manager at XAVECTOL, diamond-studded, heads up regional office.
Locations: **Charybdis**, planet: toothy terrain, deep pits, vast sea, rocky shore, pterosaur-like inhabitants.

NPCs: **Mejia**, raider: backpack dog-drones. Shaved head. Vibechete evangelist. Fit.
Locations: **Hall of Elijah**, xenostructure: 10km long barrow. 3m hole dead center. On:

NPCs: **Marozia Eco**, mercenary: a little twitchy. Moves fast, impatient. SMG.
Locations: **KP-929**, planet: dead black-sand surface. Magnificent stars, far from its sun.

NPCs: **Ruben**, barkeep: clean-shave, lots of cologne. Runs an upscale joint. Chats fluently.
Locations: **Dolor**, colony: bubbled silos, austere culture, yeast-vats and acid rain, infighting.

NPCs: **Joseph Friend**, missionary: on XAVECTOL payroll. Doesn't believe a word he says. Pays well.
Locations: **Farshore Havens**, cylinder station: opulent, tax-shelter, gift shop, pageantry.

NPCs: **Bekker**, sanitation worker: one eye, big gloves, knows maintenance systems aboard; hates them.
Locations: **Salon Blanc**, facility: full-service spa for total smoothing. Built on a slum.

NPCs: **Carr**, colonist: considers himself a "leader of men.\" Touchy. Unhelpful.
Locations: **Eagle Peak**, settlement: rocky, built in rings above the treeline. Nights are long. Screams below.

NPCs: **Alice Vanderberg**, scientist: developing homegrown bioaugmentations. Last seen 6 cycles ago.
Locations: **Tikalik Drift**, astroid field: sulfurous, far from help, thick with parasites.
**Ilium**, metropolis: glutted on mineral-tech expansion, ever-shifting lattices, shiny debauchery.
**Bowline Crater**, impact crater teeming w/ shipping; refueling stop, casinos, cuisine.
**The Throat**, long fungal passage, damp, reaches a karst cave: recursive maze.
**Granite Rise**, landform: tabula mountain, ridged with condensing pillars.
**The Red Brood**, nest: many entrances, disgorges planet-eating horde every 100 yrs. Engineered.
**The Well**, habitat: low-power, failing systems, an old cylinder. Very old. Twisted by all that time.
**Nightmare Cloak**, nebula: interferes with sensors, nasty reputation; essential route.
**Southhand**, derelict: long corridors, desperate pleas, a god on deck; so it said anyway.
**MA-733**, planet; logistics waypoint, traced with railways, isolated homesteads. Dry.
**Oom**, derelict: set drifting after refrigerant collapse. Home to a variety of parasites.
**Parushya Gate**, the creatures flow out, take choice cuts, retreat. Unassailable arch.
**Hellmouth**, ship: carrying automated legion. Collision course. Violent bioforms.
**Marmora**, mothership: home to a thousand pleasures. Roving stardock. Grandiose.
**Kharila**, planet: huge and ice-slick. Towns slipping away. War brews.
**HD-221763**, planet: common jump hub. Orbit filled with fresh crews. Quilted with farms.
**Chartak Borehole**, ever since the bore was made, people have been disappearing.
**Trigrad Gap**, region: overgrown passage between jagged ranges, 100km route, cycads.
**Corbona**, planet: pole packed tight with factories. Remaining land used for atmos. scrubbers.
**Pavarti**, planet: rumors of transformative liquids in the sea. Sandy. Caustic. Red.
**XO-12d**, planet: volcanic. Constant shattering. A great beast, abandoned there.
**Arkovna**, colony: research-focused, eyes turned to fertile soil. Terraformed conifer woods.
**Zhaotong Vault**, storehouse of corporate assets the size of a small city. High security.
**Sarnegor**, derelict: early jumpship. Burned to a skeleton. Organism feeding on reactor.
**Selephum**, vessel: predatory lab. Abducts, experiments, discards: gleefully.
**The Thomlinsen**, hauler: String lights. 200yr operating history. Home to ten souls.
